/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
